data.description: Encapsulate data for ABC music Archives
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Music - because this is related to music, not audio. There is
    already a Music::GUIDO module which proposes to handle GUIDO scores

    ABC - because this deals with music formated in the ABC format

    Archive - because this manages songs for an entire archive (an
    archive may contain hundreds of songs).
